EmailTemplate.name: Turbofest Atlanta 2015.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Turbofest Atlanta 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir or Madam}}: It is my pleasure to cordially invite you to VMTurbo’s First Annual Turbofest Atlanta! <http://vmturbo.com/resources/events/register-for-turbofest-atlanta?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbofest_Atlanta&utm_content=invite> This afternoon meeting and evening reception will be held Wednesday, June 17th 2015 beginning at 2:00 PM at the Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta Downtown. Sessions will run until 5:30PM. From there, you’ll join us in an executive suite at Turner Field for the Red Sox v. Braves game with full food and beverage. This exclusive event will feature discussions on OpenStack, SDN, engineering and managing scale out applications as well as future trends in cloud and virtualization - including an inside look at the 2015 VMTurbo Roadmap. You can register here <http://vmturbo.com/resources/events/register-for-turbofest-atlanta?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbofest_Atlanta&utm_content=invite>, and a VMTurbo executive will also contact you to address any questions you may have. I hope you will attend this exciting event; it will be one to remember. Sincerely, J. Benjamin H. Nye Chief Executive Office VMTurbo Inc.
